Мастер фраза для определения максимально: Well, that old thing almost tore me to pieces for its g
dialogs_chapter_8_Адамантовый жнец стано: The Adamant Reaper takes a fighting stance.
dialogs_chapter_8_Кто вы такие и что вам:
Who are you and what do you want from Purgatory? How have 
we annoyed you?
dialogs_chapter_8_Несмотря на усилия Рио:
Despite Riom's efforts, the adamant's servant managed to inflict 
a fatal wound - he cut the torso so that the left and right arms 
hung down along with part of the torso.
dialogs_chapter_8_Твою ж мать, Риом! Ост:
Damn it, Riom! You need to be more careful! You are not
immortal and the same reaper as all your brothers\..\..\..
That means they can chop you and them into mincemeat, easily 
and simply!
dialogs_chapter_8_Не-не-не\\..\\..\\.. Т:
No-no-no\..\..\.. You won't die here. I finally found a normal owner 
and I don't want to lose you so quickly.
dialogs_chapter_8_Меня самого ещё веками: And they'll be looking for me in this hole for centuries.
dialogs_chapter_8_Ладно. Плевать на посл: Okay. I don't care about the sequence. This is my last gift to you.
dialogs_chapter_8_Тьма окутала раны Риом:
Darkness enveloped Riom's wounds and a second later they 
healed. Riom can control his hands again.
dialogs_chapter_8_Коельтан. Что ты сейча: Koeltan. What did you do just now\..\..\.. More precisely, how?
dialogs_chapter_8_На всякий случай, у ме:
Just in case, I have one ability that will help you last longer in 
long battles - Regeneration.
dialogs_chapter_8_Тьма впивается в кожу:
The darkness bites into the skin and restores damaged body 
parts.
dialogs_chapter_8_На неё уходит много си:
It takes a lot of strength, so do not abuse it and remember,
the effect only affects you.
dialogs_chapter_8_Пользуйся и пожалуйста:
Use it and please, be careful. The servants of Adamant are far 
from weak\..\..\.. Adamant takes away years of life, in return 
granting enormous power.
dialogs_chapter_8_Эти уроды посильнее ка:
These freaks are stronger than punishers, combat reapers and 
devastators.
dialogs_chapter_8_Хорошо-хорошо, как ска: Okay, okay, as you say and thank you for the gift.
dialogs_chapter_8_Теперь нужно найти баз: Now we need to find the reaper base I was told about.
dialogs_chapter_8_Думаю, отец сможет с э: I think father can help with this.
dialogs_chapter_8_Да, Риом! Как ты? С то: Yes, Riom! How are you? Are you okay?
Yeah, fine, alive. Listen, dad, where's your reconnaissance base 
in the southern canyon? Or any gathering point.
dialogs_chapter_8_Меня при телепортации:
I got thrown into the Dark Forest during the teleportation. 
I somehow got out and don't understand where I am at all.
And also\..\..\.. I found them. The Risen, one adamantine reaper.
dialogs_chapter_8_Не легкий у тебя денек:
You've had a tough day\..\..\.. You got out of the Dark Forest
on your own, you're growing fast.
Did the adamantine servant hurt you badly?
dialogs_chapter_8_Задел\\..\\..\\.. Немн:
He did\..\..\.. A little. I dealt with him, so don't worry.
Better tell me where to go.
Yes\..\..\.. Now. Move straight to where you're looking.
In this direction we have a chain of buildings, from the time of
the energy crisis after the First Adamant War.
dialogs_chapter_8_На каждом посте есть к:
There is a map at each post, in case like yours, it will
lead to the scouts' gathering point.
That means I'm very close. Thank you, I'll meet you when I get 
there. Are you there now?
dialogs_chapter_8_Нет, Риом, я в Чистили:
No, Riom, I'm in Purgatory, preparing strike teams.
We'll be there soon, so be patient and leave us at least someone.
dialogs_chapter_8_Хорошо, буду ждать вас: Okay, I'll wait for you there.
dialogs_chapter_8_З-зачем вы всё это дел:
W-why are you doing all this? What's the point of destroying 
Purgatory?
dialogs_chapter_8_Риом, лучше верни свою:
Riom, you'd better get your confidence back. Fear will dull the 
Genome's blade to such an extent\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_(Коельтан. Заткнись. С:
(Koeltan. Shut up. Tell me what to do? There are three of them! 
And they all need to be destroyed by Ricard's order\..\..\.. and 
even without orders.)
dialogs_chapter_8_(Это главари Восставши: (These are the leaders of the Rebels. Am I right?)
dialogs_chapter_8_Да, это они ведут арми:
Yes, they are the ones leading the Rebel army. Give me time.
Talk to them, don't be aggressive, and stop shaking like an 
aspen leaf. Pity won't save you.
dialogs_chapter_8_По воле нашего владыки:
By the will of our master. Adamant, the pioneer mineral,
which you reapers enslaved and used for your own purposes.
dialogs_chapter_8_Тебе рассказывали исто:
Have you been told the story of the first reaper Pelagius, who 
built Purgatory?
dialogs_chapter_8_Нет\\..\\..\\.. Было к: No\..\..\.. There was no time for that. What did he do?
dialogs_chapter_8_Когда вы были лишь иде:
When you were just an idea in Death's head, she created her 
most powerful creation and ordered it to walk through the world 
of the Living, so that he could learn the essence of the cycle of 
life and death.
dialogs_chapter_8_Кроме этого, жнец долж:
In addition, the reaper had to create a fortress where Death
could be in its physical form. A powerful source of energy is 
needed for construction.
dialogs_chapter_8_Пелагий долго бродил п:
Pelagius wandered through the world of the Dead for a long time. 
He visited everywhere he could. But at one point the First 
Cataclysm began.
dialogs_chapter_8_Из глубин Бездны вырва:
Such powerful and terrible
creatures burst out from the depths of the Abyss\..\..\.. 
Even the Creator of all things was not well off.
dialogs_chapter_8_Пелагий им тоже попалс:
Pelagius also caught their eye. Realizing what awaited him, 
he found the nearest source of energy and built his damned 
fortress over it.
dialogs_chapter_8_Он и подумать не мог,: He couldn't even imagine that the mineral had a mind and will.
dialogs_chapter_8_И как это связано с те: And how does this relate to what you're doing now?
dialogs_chapter_8_С того момента прошили:
Centuries have passed since then. You, like Vlur-Stig, because of 
someone else's mistake, kill those who are not guilty of it.
dialogs_chapter_8_Убери оружие и выкинь: Put away your weapon and throw away your radio.
dialogs_chapter_8_Или ты хочешь умереть: Or do you want to die here and now.
dialogs_chapter_8_Риом, соглашайся. У ни:
Riom, agree. They don't have the real power to somehow 
block me. Now is a good time to find out how to destroy them all 
at once. The main thing is to be patient and listen.
dialogs_chapter_8_Фолтер, сопроводишь на: Folter, will you escort our guest?
dialogs_chapter_8_Да, без проблем. Ещё о:
Yes, no problem. Another addition to our ranks would not be 
amiss.
dialogs_chapter_8_Все верно, воля Адаман:
That's right, Adamant's will will change the course of your 
thoughts and you will become one of us.
dialogs_chapter_8_А ты думал мы тебе тур:
And did you think we would give you a tourist tour? Lay out a red 
carpet, treat you to tea? Ha-ha!
dialogs_chapter_8_Риом, верь мне и терпи: Riom, trust me and be patient.
dialogs_chapter_8_Погоди. Куда ты так по:
Wait. Where are you rushing to? We haven't even had time 
to say hello yet. Or are the rules of decency illegal in 
Purgatory?
Don't strain yourself so much. How is Irey? Does he miss me?
dialogs_chapter_8_Не упоминал, но три им:
I didn't mention it, but all of Purgatory knows three names.
Folter, Krieger, Claudius.
Wow! That's good to hear. Last time was hardly a war. We broke 
into Purgatory once, killed a lot of people, got beat up in the face 
by the combat reapers, and retreated.
dialogs_chapter_8_Из-за потери контроля:
Due to the loss of control over Adamant, you refused to use it 
and doomed yourself to a crisis from which Irey pulled you out.
dialogs_chapter_8_Он тот ещё непонятый г:
He is a misunderstood genius. He set up small mines to 
extract and transport energy so as not to deplete the sources 
of Milit.
dialogs_chapter_8_Говоришь так, как будт: You speak as if you were old acquaintances.
dialogs_chapter_8_Больше, но он это не п: More, but he won't admit it.
dialogs_chapter_8_Мы оба Иерархи, одной:
We are both Hierarchs, of the same element - control of progress, 
knowledge and wisdom in the world of the Living.
dialogs_chapter_8_Как так вышло, что ты: How did it happen that you are on the enemy's side?
dialogs_chapter_8_Чем вы оба занимались: What did you both do while you were Hierarchs?
dialogs_chapter_8_Что ты дальше намерен: What do you intend to do next?
dialogs_chapter_8_Есть причина. Меня изг:
There is a reason. I was expelled from Paradise, and they wanted 
to send their dog Sariel, the right hand of the Creator, as an 
executor after me.
dialogs_chapter_8_Для того чтобы спрятат: In order to hide, I needed to erase the traces of my spiritual energy.
dialogs_chapter_8_Может ты не заметил, н:
Maybe you haven't noticed, but all types like me radiate spiritual
energy that can be sensed thousands of kilometers away.
dialogs_chapter_8_Пришлось исполнять вол:
I had to do Adamant's will and he irradiated me with his
energy so strongly that all that was left of the Hierarch was his 
armor, and I remade it.
dialogs_chapter_8_Теперь я страж. Бродяг:
Now I am a guard. A vagabond who decides for himself what to do, 
who to serve, who to kill, if necessary.
dialogs_chapter_8_Раз начал служить Адам:
Once I began to serve Adamant, then so be it. I will remain in the 
ranks of the Risen until the end.
dialogs_chapter_8_Оберегали человечество: Protected humanity from the madness in which we are now stewing.
dialogs_chapter_8_Ограничение прогресса:
Limiting progress is a necessary thing, it protects weak, immature 
souls from an excessive overdose of knowledge.
dialogs_chapter_8_Кроме этого мы не позв:
In addition, we did not allow the phenomena of the world of the Dead
to go beyond its boundaries, especially to people.
dialogs_chapter_8_То есть из-за вас в ми:
That is, because of you, in the world of the Living there are no such 
terms as magic and the like. For people, we are only myths and 
figments of the imagination.
dialogs_chapter_8_Да, и оно к лучшему. Л:
Yes, and it's for the best. Human nature, unfortunately, is so 
distorted that such knowledge will be used for wars, for the 
destruction of the world in the name of abstract ideas or banal greed.
dialogs_chapter_8_Когда Творец погиб, ко: When the Creator died, control in both worlds was greatly shaken.
dialogs_chapter_8_У Ирея были свои причи:
Irei had his own reasons for leaving Paradise, and I was exiled for
ambition and initiative\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_Посмотри вниз. Эта арм:
Look down. This army will reach Purgatory no matter what you
do.
dialogs_chapter_8_Фолтер положил левую р: Folter placed his left hand on Riom's shoulder.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Но едва: *half-whisper* But it is unlikely that they will succeed.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* В этом б:
*half-whisper* In this crazy world, everything moves towards the 
absolute, there is no limit anywhere.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Но увы,:
*half-whisper* But alas, when you reach that peak,
the only thing left to do is jump headlong into the Abyss.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Всё что:
*half-whisper* Everything that surrounds us strives toward it, and 
it toward us.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Первый К:
*half-whisper* The First Cataclysm was just a light breath,
of what was long before the first intelligent life appeared.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Если это:
*half-whisper* If this breath almost blew away everything that our 
creator managed to do, then imagine what will happen when
the line is completely erased and it will not be held back by any 
rules of the world of the Dead.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Я принял:
*half-whisper* I have accepted this. But I am not ready to meet it, 
and in order to prepare myself I need all the power of Adamant.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Вижу, ты:
*half-whisper* I see, you are on your own mind\..\..\.. 
What do you propose?
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Обеспечь:
*half-whisper* Ensure the death of Krieger together with Claudius.
I will meet with Irei and if\..\..\.. I can settle everything with a word, 
then I will absorb Adamant without a trace, he as an entity will 
disappear from our world.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Убив дух:
*half-whisper* By killing the spirit and mind, you will extinguish all 
the lights.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Верно, в:
*half-whisper* That's right, all the Adamant crystals will go out and
will become nothing more than decoration.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* А ты? Ка:
*half-whisper* And you? What guarantees do I have that you won't 
stab me in the back when you get what you want?
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Скажем т:
*in a half-whisper* Let's put it this way\..\..\.. If Irey and all the 
reapers survive after meeting me, without a single loss, will this be 
considered an advance guarantee? And then I will leave you and 
no one will see me, ever.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Поступит:
*half-whisper* Do as Krieger intended, which is worse for you and 
all your friends. Help me, and I'll help you.
*half-whisper* Okay\..\..\.. How are you going to hide our
cooperation?
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Подыграй:
*half-whispering* Play along with me. There's a small cliff behind 
you. You'll fall, spill a couple of liters of blood, I'll pretend I didn't 
keep an eye on you and lead you away from Krieger's attention.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Теперь я:
*half-whisper* Now I understand why you were kicked out. 
With such ideas\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Сочту за: *half-whisper* I'll take that as a compliment.
dialogs_chapter_8_Гад, хоть бы предупред: Bastard, you could have at least warned me!
dialogs_chapter_8_Риом посмотрел вниз и: Riom looked down and assessed the height.
dialogs_chapter_8_Ну прости! Передай при: Well, I'm sorry! Say hello to Irei!
dialogs_chapter_8_Расскажи, как у тебя д: Tell me, how are you doing?
dialogs_chapter_8_Ты не злишься за то, ч: Aren't you mad that I beat you up?
dialogs_chapter_8_Или ты не придумал луч: Or couldn't you come up with a better topic to hit on me?
dialogs_chapter_8_Откровенно говоря, дер:
Frankly speaking, it's shitty. I have a feeling that soon my
path as a reaper will end as it covers me\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_Карательный корпус сли:
The punitive corps has been dumped. Now we are combat reapers,
the same ones who used to be killed for violations\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_Если такова воля Смерт:
If such is the will of Death, then so be it, but I would not want to
appear within the walls of Purgatory anymore.
dialogs_chapter_8_Уйти в какой-нибудь по:
To go on some kind of hike, expedition, long walk through
the world of people, to accompany the souls of those who need 
to be and there would be no claims against me.
dialogs_chapter_8_И много тех, у кого к: And how many have complaints about you?
dialogs_chapter_8_Половина Чистилища. Я:
Half of Purgatory. I was often rude to those around me, behaved
arrogantly, as if I were on a different level.
Although this is true\..\..\.. partly true.
dialogs_chapter_8_У карателей меньше огр: The punishers have fewer restrictions on freedom.
dialogs_chapter_8_Кто знал\\..\\..\\.. Ч: Who knew\..\..\.. That it would come back to haunt me like this.
dialogs_chapter_8_От последствий никто н:
No one is immune from consequences, and any freebie would 
sooner or later come to an end.
dialogs_chapter_8_Знаю-знаю, Риом, не ду: I know, I know, Riom, don't be stifling.
dialogs_chapter_8_Давай поговорим о чем-: Let's talk about something more pleasant.
dialogs_chapter_8_Рикард зачеркнул одно:
Ricard crossed out one name from our special list - Vlur-Stig.
This wandering hierarch caused us a lot of problems.
dialogs_chapter_8_Он сказал, что победа:
He said that victory belongs to you. Is it true? That you could 
defeat\..\..\.. the Hierarch? Okay, our Irey, his armor is made of
pyrite, but Vlur's is made of pure hierarchite. Our blades cannot 
penetrate that.
dialogs_chapter_8_Рик преувеличил. Мне с:
Rick exaggerated. Rita and Kenchiru helped me a lot, and
Genome Morkret showed himself well.
How is it possible\..\..\.. we couldn't defeat him as a crowd. 
Dozens of well-trained squads\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_Обычным жнецам он не п:
He's too tough for ordinary reapers, and if you hadn't attacked first,
everything could have been different.
dialogs_chapter_8_Ирни выставил указател: Irni put his index finger in front of his lips.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушепотом* Не знаю:
*half-whisper* I don't know who's right and who's not, but knowing 
the excessive bloodthirstiness of the punishers\..\..\.. 
Perhaps Vlur was telling the truth.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушепотом* Во первы:
*half-whisper* First of all, it was God knows when.
And those who attacked the Ravagers are long dead.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушепотом* Пока Рик:
*half-whisper* While Rikard is around, it's best not to bring up 
this topic.
dialogs_chapter_8_Та не парься так. Да,:
Don't worry so much. Yes, I was given a dubious order, but 
not obeying\..\..\.. you know our laws. Otherwise I
will be beheaded myself.
dialogs_chapter_8_Я благодарен, что в по: I am grateful that in a fit of passion you did not hack me to death.
dialogs_chapter_8_К счастью, все с кем т:
Fortunately, everyone you fought with during Rita's escape
has been restored.
Sometimes I get carried away\..\..\.. It's good that all disagreements 
are in the past.
dialogs_chapter_8_Вообще без проблем, мы:
No problem at all, we drank together, carried out your initiation, 
you are now one of us. What disagreements can we talk about 
here?
dialogs_chapter_8_Леди Роза, расскажи о:
Lady Rose, tell me about yourself, we haven't really been able 
to have a normal conversation outside of drinking.
dialogs_chapter_8_Я думала, что этого хв: I thought that was enough to get acquainted.
dialogs_chapter_8_Откровенно говоря, мне: Frankly, it's hard for me to talk without it.
dialogs_chapter_8_Роза достала из карман:
Rose took a bottle out of her pocket. On the front it said "Milit 
extract, for restoring mana".
dialogs_chapter_8_Но если я так тебе пон: But if you like me so much\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_Я состою в карательном:
I am a member of the punitive corps as an additional
strike force, but because of the specific weapon I am sent into 
battle only in special cases.
dialogs_chapter_8_Ещё я неплохо готовлю,:
I'm also a pretty good cook, although this skill among the reapers 
is only appreciated by Irni, Rutger, and Hiflok.
dialogs_chapter_8_У вас что-то вроде тай:
Do you have some kind of secret interest group? Or did Rikard 
entrust you with an important mission?
The answer is somewhere between\..\..\.. Punishers have a very 
short life. We once got trapped with Hiflok and Rutger, on the 
territory of Hell.
dialogs_chapter_8_А за тем появился Ирни:
And then Irni showed up. With a joint mental effort, we
made a plan and miraculously managed to get out without losses.
dialogs_chapter_8_Если бы на тебя напал: If a real demon attacked you, what would you do?
dialogs_chapter_8_Полагаю, он бы мне не: I suppose he wouldn't leave me any choice.
dialogs_chapter_8_Ой-ей-й, ответ не верн:
Oh, that's not the right answer. Riom, demons love to fight 
confident and strong opponents. Do you think Vlur-Stig just 
picked them for his mix?
dialogs_chapter_8_Убей одного и на его м:
Kill one and two even stronger ones will take his place, 
and so on down the line all the way to Satan.
dialogs_chapter_8_Сражение для нас было: The fight was suicide for us, even Irni realized that.
dialogs_chapter_8_Как-то так мы и сдружи:
Somehow we became friends. Teamwork helped us
to survive in many situations, now we stick together out of habit
as a group of four.
dialogs_chapter_8_Что ещё тебе интересно: What else are you curious about me?
dialogs_chapter_8_Так не терпится увидет: Can't wait to see it in battle?
dialogs_chapter_8_Просто интересно знать:
I'm just curious. It seems like more than
half of Purgatory knows about my Genome. 
I'd like to know at least superficially who uses what.
dialogs_chapter_8_Роза протянула Риому л: Rose extended her left hand to Riom.
dialogs_chapter_8_Ух-х-х, хватка у тебя: Wow, you have a grip of steel, I admit.
dialogs_chapter_8_Могу обнять, тогда сра:
I can hug you, then you'll immediately understand the essence of 
my main weapon.
dialogs_chapter_8_Риом, готовь, регенера:
Riom, get regeneration ready. This lady has a gigantic level 
of spiritual energy.
dialogs_chapter_8_Роза крепко обняла Рио:
Rose hugged Riom tightly. So tight that she crushed the 
reaper's ribs.
dialogs_chapter_8_Знаешь, как анаконда п: Do you know how an anaconda devours its victims?
dialogs_chapter_8_Она обвивается вокруг:
It wraps itself around its torso, breaking its ribs, slowly
suffocating it, and then slowly swallows it, no matter its size.
dialogs_chapter_8_И что из этого твоя лу:
And which of these is your best ability? Choking or
swallowing?
dialogs_chapter_8_Оу-оу, Риом, полегче,:
Ow-ow, Riom, easy, she can literally eat you if she
wants to.
(Everything is under control\..\..\.. I'm just teasing her.)
dialogs_chapter_8_Хеби-но-Йори. Или змеи:
Hebi-no-Yori. Or snake armor. The more damage I
take on it, the more painful my embrace becomes.
And the longer I embrace the victims, the stronger the
suffocation becomes.
dialogs_chapter_8_То есть тебе меч не ну: So you don't need a sword.
dialogs_chapter_8_А тебе над пошлыми под:
And you need to work on your vulgar pick-up lines.
Just not on me.
dialogs_chapter_8_Рутгер, Хифлок, как вы:
Rutger, Hiflock, how are you? Is it not the first time for you to go 
so far beyond the walls of Purgatory?
dialogs_chapter_8_Как сказать, для нас о: Well, it's a common thing for us.
dialogs_chapter_8_По велению Госпожи мы:
At the behest of the Lady, we were constantly going out on 
reconnaissance with other squads.
dialogs_chapter_8_Бывали и бились по дор: We've been there and fought with the Ravagers along the way.
dialogs_chapter_8_У вас тоже есть магиче: Do you also have magic swords like me?
dialogs_chapter_8_Не-не-не, мы не настол: No-no-no, we're not as cool as the others.
dialogs_chapter_8_Я пока не готов. Мы с:
I'm not ready yet. Rutger and I are going the way of standard
equipment and what's at hand. Yes, it deprives us of
versatility, but the risk is lower.
dialogs_chapter_8_Одержимости, или оттор:
Obsession, or rejection. Remember that bloodbath
in front of Genome Morkret?
dialogs_chapter_8_Половина нашей группы: Half of our group died trying to pass the test.
dialogs_chapter_8_Желающих было много, э:
There were many who wanted to, that's true. But one from 
another was almost indistinguishable. 
Like dolls going to slaughter. And only four reapers in all that 
time were worthy of my strength.
dialogs_chapter_8_Незачем, не ты ж их от: No need, you didn't send them.
dialogs_chapter_8_Провал испытания - отт: Failure of the test is rejection, and what is "possession"?
dialogs_chapter_8_Очень грустное явление:
A very sad phenomenon, when the owner of the sword is seized
by complete madness. If you use too much power, the element 
of your sword, then your body will become a vessel and the spirit
materializes.
dialogs_chapter_8_Внешне одержимые выгля:
Outwardly, the possessed look like the spawn of the Abyss,
demonic idols, creepy, extraordinary and all as one
damn strong.
dialogs_chapter_8_Обычно только Высший ж: Usually only the High Reaper is able to defeat such an enemy.
dialogs_chapter_8_Я знаю о разных индиви:
I know of different individuals, but this is the first time I've heard 
of such.
dialogs_chapter_8_К счастью, у нас было:
Fortunately, we have only had 2 incidents of possession in
all this time.
dialogs_chapter_8_Поэтому ты не можешь о:
That's why you can't open all your talents at once,
an overdose will happen and then I will stop being myself,
just like you.
dialogs_chapter_8_Если ты на кого-то оче:
If you get really angry at someone and want
their death more than anything in the world, then you risk 
catching an obsession.
dialogs_chapter_8_Видимо кто-то очень ув:
Apparently someone got really carried away in a fight and forgot 
about caution.
dialogs_chapter_8_(За все то время, что:
(In all the time that we've been fighting together, have I ever
come close to the limit?)
dialogs_chapter_8_Та не, даже и близко н:
No, you didn't even come close. None of the opponents you've 
met have hurt your emotions, your mental sanity.
dialogs_chapter_8_Нет, он просто тебя сл:
No, he just scared you a little, it's still not
enough for an obsession.
dialogs_chapter_8_Спасибо за предупрежде: Thanks for the warning, Rutger, Hiflock.
dialogs_chapter_8_Вы добрались без прикл: Did you get here without incident?
dialogs_chapter_8_От части. По сравнению:
To some extent. Compared to what you had to go through\..\..\..
It's a cakewalk.
dialogs_chapter_8_От части говоришь\\..\: To some extent, you say\..\..\.. And what happened to you?
dialogs_chapter_8_В этом месте немало оп:
There are quite a few Ravagers in this place, especially the savages. 
And we were ambushed by the Risen. They were waiting for us 
and had explosive charges of adamant prepared along the 
perimeter of one of the passages.
dialogs_chapter_8_Все кого ты видишь - в: Everyone you see is all that's left of us.
dialogs_chapter_8_Есть догадки, кто вас: Any guesses as to who gave you away, or what gave you away?
dialogs_chapter_8_С нами два Вероломгера:
We have two Verologers with us, and quite a few combat reapers 
with artifact weapons. I suspect that such a concentrate of energy 
is hard to miss.
dialogs_chapter_8_Пока что мы огребли, с: So far we've gotten our fill, again, but soon everything will change.
dialogs_chapter_8_Больше мне добавить не: I have nothing more to add. Let's change the subject.
dialogs_chapter_8_О чем ты так сильно за: What are you thinking about so much?
dialogs_chapter_8_Обо всем, что творится:
About everything that's happening around. Adamant, the Ravagers, 
it all seems like a deceptive maneuver\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_Влур говорил что-то пр: Vlur said something about the Abyss, that a new cataclysm is coming.
dialogs_chapter_8_И меня это пугает. Ещё:
And it scares me. Our world can't withstand another disaster like 
this.
dialogs_chapter_8_Такое чувство, что мы:
It feels like we're doing something wrong. Vlur could have 
become an ally, and with the Risen\..\..\.. Adamant, we could have 
come to some sort of agreement. Let them take their piece of 
energy and leave.
dialogs_chapter_8_Чувак, не нагнетай. Сд:
Dude, don't push it. What's done can't be undone, and even if 
the Risen make a deal, Purgatory will refuse it.
dialogs_chapter_8_У нас не осталось друг: We have no other options left.
It's too bad that it is.
dialogs_chapter_8_Смотри, Влур-Стиг стал:
Look, Vlur-Stig has become our ally, Rikard no longer leads the 
punitive corps, it's not that bad.
dialogs_chapter_8_Уверен, если и с лидер:
I'm sure if we talk to the leader of the Rebels, then we'll be able to 
find a peaceful solution.
dialogs_chapter_8_А ты оптимист\\..\\..\:
And you're an optimist\..\..\.. Come what may, my voice in the circle 
of the Werolomgers means nothing.
dialogs_chapter_8_Я рад, что ты с нами и: I'm glad you're with us and were able to get this far.
dialogs_chapter_8_Риом и Кенчиру крепко: Riom and Kenchiru shook hands firmly.
dialogs_chapter_8_Уже не так сильно. А ч: Not so much anymore. What? Is it so noticeable?
dialogs_chapter_8_Ты всегда какая-то нап:
You're always kind of tense. You were calm in the office back 
then.
Well, I'm sorry\..\..\.. I can't help it, every time
I left the walls of Purgatory, something always
happened to me.
dialogs_chapter_8_Последний раз и вовсе:
The last time almost ended in death. I can't dispute orders, but 
I'm kind of scared for my life\..\..\.. After all, the consequences of 
that night with the succubus have left a deep imprint\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_Я не должна так сильно:
I shouldn't get so emotional, otherwise the others
might start to suspect something.
Don't worry about it. For a reaper, there's nothing criminal in
excessive emotions, you didn't do anything bad.
dialogs_chapter_8_Ладно, проехали. Ты чт: Okay, let's move on. Did you want something else?
dialogs_chapter_8_Тебе с чем-то нужна по: Do you need help with something? You look a bit confused.
dialogs_chapter_8_Да, я буду благодарна,:
Yes, I would appreciate it if you could help me move this box
to the barrier.
dialogs_chapter_8_(Коельтан. Есть к тебе:
(Koeltan. I have a favor to ask of you, could you back me up,
so that I don't drop the box halfway.)
dialogs_chapter_8_Хо-хо-хо, ну если мне: Ho-ho-ho, well, if it counts in the future. No problem.
dialogs_chapter_8_Рита достала из ящика: Rita took a battery and several engineering devices out of the box.
dialogs_chapter_8_И-и готово! Как только:
And-and it's ready! As soon as the adamant's servants appear 
within a couple hundred meters, the barrier will immediately 
activate and we will be under the dome.
dialogs_chapter_8_Рикард попросил просле:
Ricard asked me to make sure that no one sneaks up on us and 
stabs us in the back.
dialogs_chapter_8_Обычно, когда я находи:
Usually, when I was on a sortie with the rest of the squads, we 
always fenced ourselves with a barrier or blocked the entrance 
to the cave with it.
dialogs_chapter_8_Опустошители не могут: The Ravagers cannot penetrate beyond its limits, but we can.
dialogs_chapter_8_Стандартная мера защит: A standard measure of protection that is not easy to break through.
dialogs_chapter_8_Слушай, Рита, меня уби:
Listen, Rita, my curiosity is killing me. When you talked about how 
the succubus taught you healing\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_Да-да? Что имен-но теб:
Yes, yes? What exactly are you interested in? More specifically, 
please.
dialogs_chapter_8_Расскажи ту часть, кот:
Tell me the part you always keep back, where she
slammed the door behind you.
dialogs_chapter_8_Ты слишком настойчивый: You're too persistent. You know that?
dialogs_chapter_8_Да, потому что мне оче:
Yes, because I'm very curious. In exchange, I can tell you my
story, too.
dialogs_chapter_8_Давай, я никому не рас:
Come on, I won't tell anyone, I've kept my word so far and
I intend to continue.
dialogs_chapter_8_Так-то у тебя выбора н:
Well, you don't have a choice. Remember the curse? How do you
counter that?
dialogs_chapter_8_Тем что ты с недавнего:
The fact that you have recently started blushing, although this is 
not typical of reapers and I have never let you down. 
Why not reveal secrets to each other in such a short time?
dialogs_chapter_8_Так-к\\..\\..\\.. Она:
So-k\..\..\.. She threw me down on the bed. She wrapped my arms 
behind that tail. I couldn't move, I said: "Enough, stop!", but she 
didn't listen and it turned her on even more.
dialogs_chapter_8_Она начала облизывать:
She began to lick my neck, slowly, moving to my chin, and then to 
my ear. At the same time, she massaged my groin area with her 
knee and played with my breasts..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_А после\\..\\..\\.. он:
And after\..\..\.. she kissed me\..\..\.. her tongue began to envelop
mine. At first it was scary, but after that it was so\..\..\.. nice.
My eyes rolled back, she did everything smoothly and it relaxed me.
dialogs_chapter_8_Риом воткнул Геном Мор: Riom stuck the Morkret Genome right in front of him.
dialogs_chapter_8_Пока мы целовались она:
While we were kissing, she tore my clothes and began to play with 
my nipples with her fingers, she switched her right hand to
my\..\..\.. *breathing heavily*\..\..\.. *half-whispering* crotch.
dialogs_chapter_8_Она массировала её, по: She massaged it, in a circle, fingering it.
dialogs_chapter_8_Постепенно с поцелуя о:
Gradually, from the kiss, she switched to the breast and began
sucking it. Her tongue circled around the nipples\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_За тем, она опустилась:
Then, she went lower, lower and lower\..\..\.. and began to do such 
things with her tongue, smoothly in a circle\..\..\.. and then I was 
covered with such a feeling, like a lightning strike, but instead of 
pain, pleasure\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_Ты кстати записывай. Т: By the way, write this down. You will need it in the future.
dialogs_chapter_8_На секунду, всё вокруг:
For a second, everything around went dark, and I seemed to lose 
consciousness\..\..\.. and in the end, she began to rub against me, 
with her crotch\..\..\.. Until the morning.
dialogs_chapter_8_Рита прикрыла лицо рук: Rita covered her face with her hands.
dialogs_chapter_8_То есть, да, больше к: I mean, yes, we won't return to this topic again.
dialogs_chapter_8_Пошли к остальным, а т: Let's go to the others, otherwise we'll be late.
dialogs_chapter_8_После всего что произо:
After everything that happened, how do you feel? The Punishers
should have dropped all charges against you.
dialogs_chapter_8_Так как их больше не с:
Since they no longer exist, and there is still no evidence of guilt, 
the charges are no longer valid. I am free.
dialogs_chapter_8_Может тогда и меня осв: Maybe then you will free me from the curse?
dialogs_chapter_8_Обещаю, после того, ка:
I promise, after everything is over, I will free you from
our contract.
dialogs_chapter_8_Давно не виделись. Как: Long time no see. How are you?
dialogs_chapter_8_Как дела в Чистилище п: How are things in Purgatory after the treaty?
dialogs_chapter_8_Давно не виделись. Как:
Long time no see. How are you? A lot has happened since
we last met.
dialogs_chapter_8_Откровенно говоря, не:
Frankly speaking, not in the best way. Rikard has crossed out
another name from the black list of punishers - Vlur-Stig, and
now he will lead us into battle against the Risen.
dialogs_chapter_8_Я бы хотела, чтоб на е: I wish it were anyone in his place\..\..\.. but not him.
dialogs_chapter_8_Теперь мы обречены пон:
We are now doomed to suffer great losses, regardless of the 
chosen strategy.
dialogs_chapter_8_Надеюсь, ты к этому го:
I hope you are prepared for this, Riom Ruri, commander of the 
punishers.
dialogs_chapter_8_После того, что мы над: After what we have done\..\..\.. How are things in Purgatory?
dialogs_chapter_8_Довольно хорошо. Работ:
Pretty good. The work of the punitive corps has ceased, they will 
unite with the combat reapers, those who will truly pose a threat 
to Purgatory will go into exile.
dialogs_chapter_8_Госпожа приняла мое пр:
The Lady accepted my proposal and now I will monitor the order 
in Purgatory, without resorting to execution for the slightest offense.
dialogs_chapter_8_Спасибо, что помог и п: Thank you for helping and supporting me.
dialogs_chapter_8_Откровенно говоря\\..\: Frankly speaking\..\..\.. I was thinking about something.
dialogs_chapter_8_Но нужно хотя бы со шт: But at least we need to finish with the assault.
dialogs_chapter_8_Когда ты вернешь релик: When will you return the relic to its place?
dialogs_chapter_8_Ха-ха-ха! У меня нет т: Hahaha! I don't have such fetishes.
dialogs_chapter_8_Просто любопытно. Если:
Just curious. If you like me so much, you can
keep them as a talisman.
dialogs_chapter_8_Значит у меня не получ: So I didn't manage to do it all covertly.
dialogs_chapter_8_Дедукция. Я помню, где:
Deduction. I remember where all my things are in the room, after 
swimming in the lake, I came back to the room and didn't find one 
piece of underwear. Before that, I only had you in the room.
dialogs_chapter_8_Хоть на голову не наде: At least you didn't put them on you head, thank you.
dialogs_chapter_8_И на всякий случай ска:
And just in case, I'll say that they do have an inspiring effect, 
perhaps you felt it in battle.
dialogs_chapter_8_Да, прилив сил больше: Yes, the surge of strength is greater than usual.
dialogs_chapter_8_Напоследок, покажи, гд: Lastly, show me where you wear them?
dialogs_chapter_8_Риом снял с правой рук: Riom took off the bracers and glove from his right hand.
dialogs_chapter_8_Они у тебя прямо в рук: They are right in your hand\..\..\.. *half-whispering* Riom\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_Ты меня не перестаешь: You never cease to amaze me.
dialogs_chapter_8_Всегда рад стараться,: Always glad to try, my lady.
Oh, go\..\..\.. better to Sidrin, he is preparing an assault plan.
dialogs_chapter_8_Лучше иди к Сидрину, о: You better go to Sidrin, he is preparing an assault plan.
dialogs_chapter_8_Хорошо, мы обязательно: Okay, we will definitely defeat Adamant's servants.
dialogs_chapter_8_Не сомневаюсь, мой гер: I have no doubt, my hero. Hee-hee.
dialogs_chapter_8_А ты что здесь делаешь: And what are you doing here?

What are you doing here? Equipment trading isn't going well
in Purgatory?
dialogs_chapter_8_Я похож на торговца? В:
Do I look like a trader? My job is to issue equipment
in exchange for spiritual energy, or with orders from the commander.
dialogs_chapter_8_Прости, не хотел груби: Sorry, I didn't mean to be rude.
dialogs_chapter_8_Неважно. Скидка помогл: Never mind. Did the discount help?
dialogs_chapter_8_Да, покупки получаются: Yeah, the shopping is pretty economical. Thanks for that!
dialogs_chapter_8_Теперь мы квиты, она с:
Now we're even, it's with you forever and we don't owe each 
other anything anymore.
dialogs_chapter_8_А по поводу моего мест:
And about my place. They ordered the equipment to be shipped 
here, so I'm shipping it.
dialogs_chapter_8_Мы готовимся штурмоват:
We're getting ready to storm the base of those adamantite 
bastards, but let the army leave from there, otherwise we'll get 
punched in the face again.
dialogs_chapter_8_И тогда поражение в во: And then defeat in the war is inevitable.
dialogs_chapter_8_Всё настолько плохо? У: Is it that bad? Purgatory should have good defense.
dialogs_chapter_8_Дерек слегка хихикнул:
Derek chuckled slightly and choked, and then gestured
for Riom to move closer.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Дверь в: *half-whisper* The door to the village toilet would be more reliable.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Почему?:
*half-whisper* Why? Where is the breach? And do the enemies 
know about it?
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Барьер и:
*half-whisper* The barrier and the ground are our greatest 
weakness. Do you know why?
dialogs_chapter_8_У барьера есть огранич:
The barrier has damage limits, and by breaking the ground
you can collapse all the buildings?
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* Почти. У:
*half-whispering* Almost. We have many passages and paths 
underground that the Risen can use.
dialogs_chapter_8_*полушёпотом* А барьер:
*in a half-whisper* And the barrier\..\..\.. Previously it was held up 
by Adamant, and now by a weak Milite generator. It is so fragile 
now\..\..\.. It will hardly withstand the crimson lightning of Vlur-Stig.
dialogs_chapter_8_Здравствуй. Я Риом Рур: Hello. I am Riom Ruri, from the\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_Дерек, интендант, числ: Derek, quartermaster, I am listed among the combat reapers.
dialogs_chapter_8_Что нужно? Сразу скажу:
What do you need? I'll tell you right away, I only have basic gear.
If you need modifications or upgrades, contact the engineering 
corps.
No need for anything for now. Listen, why do you need a mask 
without a helmet? Your head is unprotected and open to attack 
anyway.
dialogs_chapter_8_Чтобы окружающие не ви:
So that others don't see my shame. I was a little unlucky at work 
and someone in Purgatory planted an explosive ingot in my box.
dialogs_chapter_8_Я его по невнимательно:
I accidentally confused it with a life ingot, activated it and 
you can see for yourself\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_Ну так, как? Покупать: So, how about it? Are you going to buy something?
dialogs_chapter_8_Ты так любишь заводить: Do you love making friends among strangers?
dialogs_chapter_8_Слушай, только без оби:
Listen, no offense. I don't care who you are.
Everyone I've talked to quickly disappeared and was 
replaced by the same faces, but with a different soul.
dialogs_chapter_8_Твое лицо не исключени:
Your face is no exception, but I admit, your feats are 
impressive, you're holding on and if you last until the end of 
the war and survive, then we'll talk.
dialogs_chapter_8_А до этого, держи дист:
And until then, keep your distance, I don't want to feel 
emotions if you suddenly die. Years of service as a reaper 
have been enough.
dialogs_chapter_8_Давай так, ты расскаже:
Let's do it this way, you tell me about your blade, I'll tell you 
about mine. Agreed?
Okay, Riom, slow down. Not a word about my skills. Got it?
dialogs_chapter_8_Его главная стихия - ж:
Its main element is the thirst for the target's blood. 
The more I want to kill someone, the more damage 
will be dealt to that target. It manifests itself as a slicing 
darkness.
dialogs_chapter_8_Сколько ты мне рассказ: As much as you told me, so much I will tell.
dialogs_chapter_8_У Дерека из серебренно:
Derek formed a sword in his hand from silver dust,
shaped like a kukri.
dialogs_chapter_8_Асгура Шинабион, или “:
Asgura Shinabion, or "dance of silver in the wind". 
The stronger my equanimity and composure, the more 
dangerous and deadly the attacks will be. 
It manifests as a stream of silver dust.
dialogs_chapter_8_Хм\\..\\..\\.. Получае:
Hmm\..\..\.. So it turns out there's a desert around 
Purgatory\..\..\.. Do you have a form of release?
dialogs_chapter_8_Не-не-не, это не моих:
No-no-no, it's not my doing. The desert with silver instead 
of sand was there long before Purgatory appeared.
dialogs_chapter_8_И часто приходилось пу: And did you often have to use Asgura?
dialogs_chapter_8_Не так часто, как тебе:
Not as often as you. I don't remember the last time I fought 
someone. I only use a couple of skills in the arena sometimes, 
so I don't forget how to fight.
dialogs_chapter_8_Если повезет, увидишь: If you're lucky, you'll see Asgura in full.
dialogs_chapter_8_Отец, я пришёл как ты: Father, I came as you said.
dialogs_chapter_8_Хорошо, молодец, что д: Good, well done for making it.
dialogs_chapter_8_Сидрин крепко обнял Ри:
Sidrin hugged Riom tightly and patted him lightly on the 
shoulder.
And I'm glad to see you.
dialogs_chapter_8_Слышал вы готовитесь к:
I heard you are preparing to storm the Risen base. 
What is your plan?
dialogs_chapter_8_Мы готовы, осталось по:
We are ready, all that remains is to prepare the ground for 
the strike. I will entrust this task to you, Irni and Kenchiru.
dialogs_chapter_8_Вы должны тихо, без бо:
You must quietly, without a fight, penetrate their base. 
Along the way, Kenchiru will scatter sound traps, they 
will attract the attention of all the sentries on the outer perimeter.
dialogs_chapter_8_За тем вы должны остор:
Then you must carefully mine the
Adamant crystals with special explosive ingots. They explode
only through detonation, and the crystal will not react to them,
thanks to the insulation.
dialogs_chapter_8_Понял. Дальше что? Мы: Got it. What next? We mined them\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_И дальше вы в укромном:
And then you place portable teleporters in a secluded place.
Laurita activates them and after my signal you detonate
the crystals, the number of Risen is reduced by half.
dialogs_chapter_8_Лаурита врывается с от:
Laurita breaks in with a squad through the teleporters, 
finishes off those who are inside the base, and I finish 
off those who were distracted by the sound traps.
dialogs_chapter_8_Под шумок вы пробирает:
Under the noise, you make your way to the main 
crystal, plant a mine, let everyone know about it, 
run away with everyone and the Risen base goes up 
in the air.
dialogs_chapter_8_Идея неплохая, но что: Not a bad idea, but what if one of the leaders is here?
dialogs_chapter_8_Мы с ними быстро разде:
We'll deal with them quickly. You and 2 more High Reapers,
if the leader is alone, he has no chance.
dialogs_chapter_8_Понял. Надеюсь, твой п: Got it. I hope your plan works.
dialogs_chapter_8_Сработает. Как будешь: It will work. When you're ready, come to me.
dialogs_chapter_8_Ирни, Кен, пора выдвиг: Irni, Ken, it's time to move.
dialogs_chapter_8_*Тихонько присвистывае: *Whistles softly* There are a lot of people\..\..\..
dialogs_chapter_8_Помните, без шума, ина:
Remember, no noise, otherwise the plan will fail and 
we'll all be killed.
dialogs_chapter_8_Отлично, первый пункт:
Great, point one completed, now explosives and
teleporters.
dialogs_chapter_8_Вроде всё. По сигналу: That seems to be it. There will be a huge "bang" on the signal.
dialogs_chapter_8_Пап, всё готово. Ждем: Dad, everything is ready. Waiting for the signal.
dialogs_chapter_8_Молодцы, один момент\\:
Well done, one moment\..\..\.. Prepare to activate the traps and
explosives simultaneously.
dialogs_chapter_8_Риом, двигай к главном: Riom, move to the main mineral!
dialogs_chapter_8_Расскажи, как мы будем: Tell me how we're going to storm the rebel base?
dialogs_chapter_8_Ждешь от меня изысканн:
Are you expecting a sophisticated strategy from me? 
Commendable, I'll take it as a compliment.
dialogs_chapter_8_Но увы, Риом, мы будем: But alas, Riom, we will be hitting the Risen head-on.
dialogs_chapter_8_Перевес сил на нашей с:
The balance of power is on our side. There will be 
a separate task for you.
dialogs_chapter_8_Возьми, Ирни, Кенчиру,:
Take Kenchiru, Irni, for company and make your way 
around, while we will knead everyone in our path.
dialogs_chapter_8_У Ирни будет взрывчатк:
Irni will have explosives. As soon as you reach the 
main crystal, blow it up and run away.
dialogs_chapter_8_Ну не все прислужники:
Well, not all the servants came out to get some fresh air.
That happens.
dialogs_chapter_8_Проломим ему череп и д: Let's break his skull and finish the job. Let's go!
dialogs_chapter_8_Вы! Явились в мою обит:
You! You came to my abode, destroying everything left and 
right\..\..\.. Reapers, you still haven't changed!
dialogs_chapter_8_Я тот, кого вы боитесь:
I am the one you fear most, the one who can blow up 
everything around with a flick!!!
dialogs_chapter_8_Ничего себе, он у нас: Wow, he's number one on our list, what a jackpot.
dialogs_chapter_8_Подожди. Зачем ты раз:
Wait. Why do you keep going to war against us?
What's your goal?
dialogs_chapter_8_Если ты отступишь и ув:
If you retreat and take your minions away from 
the canyon, we can live in peace and even help each other.
dialogs_chapter_8_Если бы ваши создатели:
If only your creators were as sensible\..\..\..
The first reaper Pelagius used me as a charger for his
staff to build a fortress a couple of kilometers high 
above my head.
dialogs_chapter_8_Пусть на него хоть сам:
Eternity itself may press on him, but there is no excuse 
for this act. I haven't touched anyone for centuries, 
I haven't caused any harm. So why did they use me 
like a piece of stone, as if I had no soul?!
dialogs_chapter_8_Ваши Вероломгеры не см:
Your Werolomgers Ones will not be able to forgive me 
for my actions, any more than I will be able to forgive yours.
dialogs_chapter_8_Но к тебе Риом у меня:
But I have a counter-offer for you, Riom. Come 
over to my side, accept the power that I give to my 
warriors, and help us, the Risen, create a new society 
of reapers.
dialogs_chapter_8_Твои друзья тоже могут:
Your friends can also join you. When you lead my warriors
to the goal, we will rebuild Purgatory with its bastard orders, 
you will see the world in a new light and cleanse your soul 
from imposed sins.
dialogs_chapter_8_Риом показал Адаманту: Riom showed Adamant the middle finger.
dialogs_chapter_8_Ты\\..\\..\\.. Кусок г: You\..\..\.. A piece of shit in a helmet!!!
dialogs_chapter_8_Слушай, Риом, почему и:
Listen, Riom, why did you decide to refuse like that?
With the middle finger.
dialogs_chapter_8_Мне очень не понравило:
I really didn't like his proposal\..\..\.. And I couldn't think 
of anything to say\..\..\.. So I just sent him away, without 
a word.
dialogs_chapter_8_Это\\..\\..\\.. Когда:
This\..\..\.. When we drink, this will be the best joke! 
Ahahahaha!
dialogs_chapter_8_*тяжелая отдышка* Ух-х:
*heavy breathlessness* Uh-h-h, okay. Let's go to 
the others.
dialogs_chapter_8_Не стоит попадаться на:
I shouldn't let myself be seen by the Risen. I can hardly handle 
him alone.
